column2: This character secretly cheats on her spouse.
Occasionally, women will spawn as secret sluts, enjoying the thrill of cheating on their spouses.
Secret sluts will not spawn in the game.

She unclasps the cloak and lets it drop to the ground, revealing that she is wearing absolutely nothing underneath. [From.GetFirstName] brings a finger up to her lips. "I've wanted you for a long time, My [Root.GetLordLady]."

I protest, saying that she's a married woman, but her reply is simple: [From.GetFirstName] turns around against the alley wall, bends down, and spreads her legs, showing off her inviting pussy for me. "Nobody will ever have to know about this," she whispers.

The shadows in the alley are dark enough that nobody would recognize us even if they did see us... "Go ahead, My [Root.GetLordLady], fuck me hard."
